reviewText: A tender story that gets complicated due to the consequences of depleted uranium use. The little boy is the real victim that takes the parents along. I like how the protagonist portrays the complex psychological states of someone discovering that a tragedy is unfolding. Great video!

This is a 10 minutes trash video and a peace of junk. Whoever wants to buy DVDs about war and its destructive effect on life, please do not get fooled to buy this junk. There are so many wonderful documentaries like "Why we fight", "Iraq for Sale", ...

In the Acting part of "WORD OF ART",The Well known and Famous Actress EVA MARIA LEONARTHOU, though in a short role, demonstrated again her superb acting capability. We all,very anxiously are waiting to see her in bigger roles she is deserving.
